alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 9:31PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 24.1 feet Friday evening. It will then fall to flood stage early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 24.2 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 23.8 Wed 8 pm CST 24.1 24.0 24.1 &&
